义务教育教科书六年级下册义务教育教科书英语六年级下册 （三年级起点） （三年级起点） ENGLISH 英语全国价格举报电话：12315：6.00元 
[中国] 河北 教育 出版 社 [加拿大] DC加拿大国际交流中心合作编写 ENGLISH 义务教育教科书英语六年级下册 （三年级起点） 
亲爱的同学们，新学期开始啦！ 这学期你们要学习有关运动、 健康生活方式以及暑假活动等方面的知识。 同学们，养成良好的生活习惯非常重要。 你们想知道如何搭配营养、合理饮食吗？ 你们想知道每天需要锻炼多长时间才能保持身体健康吗？ 对小学阶段的最后一个假期，你们有什么打算呢？ 李明要回家了。你们想知道他的朋友们会怎样与他道别吗？那就开始我们这学期的学习吧！ 同学们，小学阶段的英语学习就要结束了，在丰富多样、活泼有趣的英语活动中，你们已经掌握了一定的英语知识，你们的听、说、读、写能力有了很大的提高。你们会唱、会说很多的英语歌曲和歌谣，也学到了很多英语学习方法，了解了不同国家的文化差异，丰富充实了自己，为未来的学习奠定了基础。 我们相信，在今后的英语学习中，你们会越来越棒！ 致同 学致 同学

content: 13 ★ Read and talk ● Why did the boy use boxes and bottles as his footballs? ● Why did the coach give him a football as a gift? ● What can you learn from Pele? 3 4 At Christmas time, the boy wanted to do something for the kind coach. He ran to the coach’s home and dug a hole in front of his house. The coach asked why. The boy said, “I can’t buy you a Christmas gift. But I can dig a hole for your Christmas tree.” The coach was happy. He said, “This is the best Christmas gift.” The coach asked the boy to be a player on his football team. In 1958, the 17-year-old boy and his team won the World Cup. He was famous around the world. 5 Do you know who the boy is ? He is Pele — the world famous football player!

content: My Favourite Sport Hello! I’m Guo Yang. I like sports very much. I like running and playing basketball. Basketball is my favourite sport. I often play basketball with my friends after school. We have two teams — the Blue Team and the Orange Team. Each team has five players. Steven and I are on the Blue Team. Li Lin is on the Orange Team. We have fun together. On Sunday, I like to watch basketball games on TV. My favourite basketball player is Yao Ming. I want to be a basketball player like him.

content: 30 Lesson 12 Helen Keller Story time Helen Keller was born in the U.S. in 1880. When she was 19 months old, she fell ill and became deaf and blind. Her parents loved her very much, but they did not know how to help her. 1 2 4 3 In 1887, her parents met a teacher, Anne Sullivan. Anne became Helen’s friend. She wanted to teach Helen words. But it was very hard. She couldn’t see anything. She couldn’t hear anything. She couldn’t speak at all. Helen often got angry. Sometimes, she threw her food from the table.

content: 31 ★ Read and talk She learned to speak, read and write. When she was 20 years old, she went to university. Later, she became a great writer. 5 6 8 7 One day, Anne took Helen’s hand and let her feel the water. She wrote the word “water” on Helen’s hand. And Helen got it. ● Why did Helen often get angry? ● Was Helen’s teacher great? ● Do you know the book The Story of My Life ? ● What can you learn from Helen Keller? From that day on, Helen Keller began to study every day. She worked very hard. Helen learned many new words every day. One of her famous books is . Helen’s story gives everyone hope.

content: 66 Lesson 24 Danny’s Surprise Cake Story time Danny gets up early in the morning. Today is the last day of school. His class is going to have a party. He is going to make a cake. 1 3 In the afternoon, the class party begins. Mr. Wood brings some ice cream. Jenny brings some cookies. Every cookie looks like a student in the class! When the cake is cool, he makes a special picture on it. Danny takes his cake to school. He walks slowly because the cake is heavy. Danny’s cake is special, too. ”It looks great, Danny!“ says Jenny. ”Thanks! It’s a surprise cake,“ says Danny. 4 2 What’s the surprise? There! What do I need? I think I remember. You will see!

content: 67 ★ Talk and act 5 6 7 Everyone has a cookie, a piece of cake and some ice cream. Then a girl says, “Danny, I think you forgot something.” Oh, no! The cake isn’t good! Danny forgot the sugar! Soon everyone has a dollar. Every piece of cake has a dollar in it! “That’s the surprise!” says Danny. “Thanks, Danny! This cake is the best!” everyone says. Mr. Wood gets a box and puts a piece of surprise cake in it. Then he writes Li Ming’s address on the box. Dear Li Ming, This is a piece of surprise cake. It has two surprises. It isn’t good to eat. That’s the first surprise. Danny made it and he forgot the sugar. The second surprise is inside the cake! We miss you! From Mr. Wood and your friends in Canada A week later, Li Ming gets a box from Canada. Inside, he finds a piece of very old, very dry cake! There is a letter, too. Li Ming looks inside the cake. Let’s send Li Ming a piece of cake! Me, too! Is that the surprise? No. 8 Look! I found a dollar in my cake!

The old man was sad. A long time ago, in the north of China, there lived an old man. He was a farmer. He had many nice horses. His family was happy. What Will Be, Will Be What Will Be, Will Be

content: 85 His friends came to say how sorry they were. The only thing the old man said was “What will be, will be.” And he went on with his work. Months later, some people near the farm saw the black horse coming home with two beautiful white horses. They told the good news to the old farmer. He thanked them and said quietly, “What will be, will be.” And he went on with his work. 86 The old man’s son loved the big black horse. He wanted to learn to ride. So, his father began to teach him. But during the boy’s first lesson, he fell from the horse and broke his leg. He could not walk well. The boy was sad. The old farmer’s friends came to say how sad they were. The old man j ust said, “What will be, will be.” And he went on with his work.

content: 87 A few weeks later, it began to snow. It snowed all day and all night. It was very cold. The king ordered all the boys from each family to go to catch fish in the cold river water. The old farmer’s son could not walk, so he didn’t have to go to the river. The old man watched the boys working hard in the cold water. He said to himself, “What will be, will be.” And he went on with his work. north 北；北方 told 告诉（ tell 的过去式） news 消息；新闻 quietly 安静地 during 在……期间 broke 折断（ break 的过去式） few 很少；不多 himself 他自己 88 The ducks and the other animals on the farm laughed at him and pushed him around. Mother Duck had new babies. She took them to swim. One baby was big and strange. The Ugly Duckling The Ugly Duckling Look at that duckling! He looks so strange. He is big and ugly. No one likes me. Go away!

content: 89 The ugly duckling met two wild ducks. They laughed at him. Then a dog came, and he killed the two wild ducks. A heavy rain began to fall. The ugly duckling was so wet and cold. He ran and ran. Soon, he arrived at a farm. Don’t worry. I won’t eat you. You are too ugly. No, but I can swim! Can you catch a mouse? Can you give eggs? 90 Soon it was autumn. The ugly duckling was swimming in the river. Some swans flew over the duckling. It became colder and colder. Finally winter arrived. Early one morning, a farmer saw the frozen duckling. What beautiful birds! I wish I could be like them. Oh, poor duckling! I’ll take you home.

content: 91 Soon the duckling got well. The children wanted to play with the duckling. But he was afraid. One day, the ugly duckling’s wings became strong. He flew high into the sky. ugly 丑陋的 duckling 小鸭子 strange 奇怪的 laugh at 嘲笑 push 推 kill 杀死 frozen 冻僵的 swan 天鹅 Come and play with us! No, I don’t want to play! Wow, I can fly so high! Look! The ugly duckling is not a duck at all. He is a beautiful swan!
